title: Reconcile Bank Statement
description: An accountant needs to perform the monthly bank reconciliation, matching transactions in the general ledger to the bank statement.

tasks.description: Import the monthly bank statement into the accounting software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports the bank transaction data.

tasks.description: Run the automated matching process to reconcile transactions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically matches 95% of the transactions.

tasks.description: Identify and investigate any outstanding, unmatched items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies three unmatched items that require manual investigation (e.g., a bank fee, an unrecorded debit).
